START.name: Starting place
START.desc: This is the place to start!

LOC1.name: Location 4
LOC1.desc: As you step into the dark room, you find your next step nonexistent, and fall down a large hole. At the bottom, you thankfully land on a mattress, however there is no way out. You rot to death.

LOC2.name: Location 2
LOC2.desc: Here is the second location. The only way to go is N

LOC5.name: Location 5
LOC5.desc: You enter the room and find a box. You open it, ready to defend you life if something comes out. To your surprise, you find gold, treasure and silver. You jump in joy. You leave through a window and spend your money on lotto tickets

LOC6.name: Location 6
LOC6.desc: A gargling, demonic creature erupts out of the ground, grabbing your legs before you can evade. He drags you down a fiery hole while you feel complete terror. He feeds you to his children. Bobby thought your meat was tough.

LOC7.name: Location 7
LOC7.desc: You enter a room filled with nothing but cake. You celebrate, how can anything be better than this???!!!

LOC8.name: Location 8
LOC8.desc: You walk into a unfamiliar room. You look around and see other people there, using computers. The room is labeled LI503. A knight in shining armor says his name is Jason Fancis. He leads you to a seat, where you start your career in the computer software development industry. You win in life.
